dcterms:description: The Synapse dataset consists of 30 abdominal CT scans ranging in size from 512 x 512 x 85 to 512 x 512 x 198 voxels, labeled to identify eight major abdominal organs.

dcterms:description: The ACDC dataset consists of cine MRI images from 100 patients, designed for 3D cardiac image segmentation.

dcterms:description: The Left Atrial Dataset consists of 100 three-dimensional MR images, all of which have undergone gadolinium enhancement.

dcterms:description: The NIH pancreas dataset (CT-82) includes 82 publicly available, contrast-enhanced, annotated three-dimensional CT scans of the abdominal region.
